mapper.sql: id, `name`, `type`, host, port, `database`, username, password, url, remark, del_flag, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by
mapper.insert: insert into dts_gen_datasource (id, name, `type`, host, port, `database`, username, password, url, remark, del_flag, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{database,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into dts_gen_datasource
id,
name,
`type`,
host,
port,
`database`,
username,
password,
url,
remark,
del_flag,
create_date,
create_by,

update_by,

mapper.update:
update dts_gen_datasource
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
host = #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
port = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`database` = #{database,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dts_gen_datasource set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, host = #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `database` = #{database,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from dts_gen_datasource where del_flag!=1
AND `name` LIKE CONCAT('%','${name}','%')
